modName: Fast Sit 'n Relax with Follower Support and a fistful of buffs
summary:
No need to equip or cast stuff: JUST sit, lean, ledge-sit, lay down and more.
Each idle activity is provided with a cinematic style camera and followed by a unique buff.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=orange]


**************************************************************************************
Latest version now features a failsave/abort mechanism: Use jump to abort any sit/relax sequence.
**************************************************************************************[/center][/color]


[center][img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/53228-3-1405853289.png[/img]

Simply allows you to fire an idle instantly [u]without[/u] doing any time consuming stuff.
It comes with Follower support & a fistful of cool buffs, cinematic style camera and more...![/center]

[center][b][size=25]HUGISH[/size] Content Update[/b][/center]
Script count has risen from 5 to 25 compared to the previous version

+ Added cinematic style camera
+ Added Lean idle
+ Added Ledge sit idle
+ Added Lay down idle
+ Added Two Special idles
+ Added Furniture support
+ Added a fistful of cool buffs
+ Added advanced Follower Routine
+ Fixes, tweaks and balancing
+ Extra SkyUI Setup Page for your needs
+ More, more, more

[center]
[b]REQUIREMENTS:[/b]
- SKSE 1.06.16+
- SKYUI 4.1+

[/center]
author: portbash
